author: Nathaniel Weixel
description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention upended the childhood vaccine schedule Monday, reducing the number of recommended shots for kids.  Effective immediately, the agency will recommend only vaccines for 11 diseases, down from 17. The shots for the other six diseases will be recommended for “high risk” children only, or under a framework called “shared decision making” based...

author: Ashleigh Fields
description: Judge Alvin Hellerstein, one of the longest-serving sitting judges in the U.S., is set to oversee the high-profile case for Venezuelan regime leader Nicolás Maduro.  Hellerstein has had a career spanning decades inside the courtroom and will preside over Maduro’s case for the Southern District of New York.  The 92-year-old has handled high-profile legal proceedings in...
title: Who is Judge Alvin Hellerstein, the 92-year-old overseeing Maduro case?

description: Democrats are still likely to win this year’s Minnesota gubernatorial race after the current governor, Tim Walz (D), ending his campaign, according to Sabato’s Crystal Ball. description: The Venezuelan army is mourning the two dozen soldiers it says were killed in the U.S. operation to capture the country’s president, Nicolás Maduro, this past weekend. The army posted a tribute to the soldiers on Instagram Monday. The U.S. captured and arrested Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, in the pre-dawn hours of Saturday....

Tim Walz (D), who announced Monday that he was dropping his campaign for a third term. “I love my job, I love my state and I’m seriously considering it,” the North Star State’s senior senator told CNN. description: Activity during the current flu season is growing to severe levels, with the percentage of doctors' visits for flu-like illnesses reaching the highest level on record, according to the most recent data from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). According to the CDC's FluView dashboard, which tracks data on influence like illness (ILI)...
